# gx-canvas-cell

A cell for the [gx-canvas](../canvas/readme.md) component

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                                                                       | Type                            | Default  |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- | -------- |
| `align`     | `align`      | Defines the horizontal alignment of the content of the cell.                                                                                                      | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"` | `"left"` |
| `left`      | `left`       | Defines the left position of the control which is relative to the position of its `gx-canvas` container. This attribute maps directly to the `left` CSS property. | `string`                        | `"0px"`  |
| `maxHeight` | `max-height` | This attribute defines the maximum height of the cell.                                                                                                            | `string`                        | `null`   |
| `minHeight` | `min-height` | This attribute defines the minimum height of the cell when its contents are visible.                                                                              | `string`                        | `"100%"` |
| `top`       | `top`        | Defines the top position of the control which is relative to the position of its `gx-canvas` container. This attribute maps directly to the `top` CSS property.   | `string`                        | `"0px"`  |
| `valign`    | `valign`     | Defines the vertical alignment of the content of the cell.                                                                                                        | `"bottom" \| "medium" \| "top"` | `"top"`  |
| `width`     | `width`      | This attribute lets you specify the width of the control.                                                                                                         | `string`                        | `"100%"` |

---

_Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)_
